name: Rhythm and Bears!
description:
Join Bjorn and Bucky and all their friends as they put on a fabulous concert… and you get to direct the show!

Put together your own band, choose their instruments, and show off your musical skills & compositions. Use lights, smoke machines and even a laser show to make your musical extravaganza even more memorable! You’re in charge. It’s time to become the director of your very own music festival!

Children’s creativity will flourish as they experience the joy of making music in this new adventure with Bjorn & Bucky. Put on a performance by your favorite animated friends and even get involved yourself! Use the app to record your voice, and the bears will perform your song!


User Agreement: http://i-mult.tlum.ru/agreement-overall
Privacy Policy: http://i-mult.tlum.ru/privacy
